name: The Magical Girl in PROXY - Capstone Edition
name_original: The Magical Girl in PROXY - Capstone Edition
description:
The Magical Girl in PROXY is about a girl with amnesia who is sure about three things:

1. She loves flan.

2. She needs to find out what happened to her friend.

3. She has the ability to turn the other girls in her class into magical girls.

Note: This is the demo I made for my capstone project back in 2016, uploaded for archival purposes. It doesn't reflect the direction I'm taking The Magical Girl in PROXY. For example, in the final game the battles are going to be platformers.

Keyboard:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Z - Talk

X - Dash

C - Attack

V - Projectile

Escape - Pause

Controller:

Left Stick - Movement

A - Talk

B - Dash

X - Attack

Y - Projectile

Start - Pause
